attributes.action: NHS to use existing £2/day CURE for Dementias,Cancers,Diabetes etc
attributes.additional_details:
I want the gov't to stop millions of people suffering and dying  from Dementias,Cancers,Diabetes etc.
The CURE costs about £2/day and has been in existence for more than 15 years.
It is available from Zone Labs based near Boston, U.S.A.
A few teaspoons per day of their high purity marine Omega 3's improves the patients blood resulting in these remarkable outcomes.
In the case of traumatic injury such as Michael Schumacher's  full recovery has been achieved 100% of the time.
Play 5 minute video at wwwdotzonedietdotcom .
